column5: Hey guys, Going to ogoki res. in mid august, been there a few times. Can anyone tell me about brook trout fishing in the ogoki river? I know how good the walleye and pike fishing is, but i would love to try for some brookies. But do not want to waste our time if i am chasing a fantasy, because it is a good distance from or camp to get into the ogoki river from the mojikit channel. Any info would be appreciated. Machster
